content.html: Companies not honoring signed offer letters now ups the ante in how much distrust between employer and employees will now exist. Not only can they fire you at any time, you can quit your job & relocate only for them to renege on the offer. Not burning bridges is so important.
content.value:
Companies not honoring signed offer letters now ups the ante in how much distrust between employer and employees will now exist. Not only can they fire you at any time, you can quit your job & relocate only for them to renege on the offer.

Not burning bridges is so important.

content.html: Bro we watched Coinbase fuck up. Then watched people still go work at Coinbase. Then watched them get laid off almost immediately. No, it doesn't matter if these companies burn bridges. People out here do not learn lessons. Their hiring pipeline will be fine.
content.value:
Bro we watched Coinbase fuck up. Then watched people still go work at Coinbase. Then watched them get laid off almost immediately.

No, it doesn't matter if these companies burn bridges. People out here do not learn lessons. Their hiring pipeline will be fine.
